metadata.name: Potentially Suspicious Regsvr32 HTTP/FTP Pattern
metadata.comment: Detects regsvr32 execution to download/install/register new DLLs that are hosted on Web or FTP servers.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\regsvr32.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('regsvr32.exe') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /i')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -i'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ftp')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('http'))))

output.summary: Detects regsvr32 execution to download/install/register new DLLs that are hosted on Web or FTP servers.
